title: BlockFi CEO Faces Allegations of Risk Disregard, Contributing to Collapse Amid FTX
description: Crypto lending firm BlockFi’s CEO, Zac Prince, allegedly ignored recommendations from the company’s risk management team regarding lending assets to Alameda Research, according to a recent court filing. The filing, made on July 14 with the United States Bankruptcy Court for the District of New Jersey by the unsecured creditors’ committee, reveals that BlockFi had ... Read more
